channel.title: Endless-hood V1 [CLIENT] [First release]
channel.description:
welcome. this is my 2nd release of a client. but my other client was gamer-scape v1.
[b] If this is on anythink but this and silabsoft then its leeched (please tell me) [/b] Sorry for the lack of pictures i was in a rush, i will post some more when i have the time
If you want the matching source for this you can get that here
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,307981.0.html or http://silabsoft.org/smf/index.php?showtopic=7727
Features ~Custom sideicons ~Custom skill icons ~Normal gs specs
I cant remember most of them so i will add them if i can remember them.
Some pictures ( once again sorry for lack will add more soon )
Loaded screen [IMG]http://i520.photobucket.com/albums/w328/ash-dude34/03-10-200822-16-42.png[/img]
Playing screen ( with custom icons ) [IMG]http://i520.photobucket.com/albums/w328/ash-dude34/03-10-200822-19-35.png[/img]
Normal GS Spec [IMG]http://i520.photobucket.com/albums/w328/ash-dude34/03-10-200822-23-33.png[/img]
I did say there was a lack of pics. lol
ill definatly add some soon.
Credits
~Me 70% for creating it all ~fernando 30% for extras
Download links
UPPIT - http://uppit.com/TWKL4Y
File front - http://files.filefront.com/endless+hoods+clientrar/;11965787;/fileinfo.html
